gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 120, Bulls 119
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Bulls, 120-119. Jalen Brunson tallied his eleventh 40-point game of the season with 40 points, eight rebounds, and seven assists as Donte DiVincenzo added 25 points and seven rebounds for New York. The Bulls were led by DeMar DeRozan (30 points, five rebounds, five assists) and Nikola Vucevic (29 points, 11 rebounds). The Knicks improve to 50-32 to end the season as the Bulls finish at 39-43. The Knicks officially secure the two-seed with the win today and the Bucks loss.
